subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Playing with the Erie BayHawks, a Development League team, Chris Smith has an opportunity to show Knicks fans that he belongs in the N.B.A. because of his skills, not his brother.
snippet: Playing with the Erie BayHawks, a Development League team, Chris Smith has an opportunity to show Knicks fans that he belongs in the N.B.A. because of his skills, not his brother.
